ComicInfo.Title: International Incident Part 3: "Hawk Among The Sparrows"
ComicInfo.Summary: Special thanks to Hasbro's Aaron Archer, Michael Kelly, Amie Lozanski, Val Roca, Ed Lane, Michael Provost, Erin Hillman, Jos Huxley, Samantha Lomow, and Michael Verrechia for their invaluable assistance.International Incident Part 3: "Hawk Among The Sparrows": Prime and the Autobots continue to attempt to stop the Combaticons' rampage (minus Swindle) in South Korea with the help of former Decepticon Thundercracker, and drive them back into North Korea pushing them farther north, but are stopped at the Chinese border by 4 of the 5 Predacons (minus their leader Razorclaw).
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-03-22 17:22:41. [Issue ID 778762]
